general_advisory: Visit to field regularly to observe the infestation levels and the incidence of pests. Monitor and take necessary action based on prevailing weather conditions. Keep animals clean and vaccinated against diseases.

advisory: If late transplanted rice is in PI/early flowering stage, apply additional dose of MOP 12 Kg/acre or foliar spray of MOP (0:0:50)@8-10g/litre of water along with 20%boron @1.5g/litre of water recommended.
Make alleys in field for proper penetration of sunlight and better aeration.
Monitor the activity of Gundhy bug in rice field and install rotten snail trap for mass trapping and killing of the pest.
Apply insecticides targeted at the plant base to protect against early stage infestation.
Wrapping and propping of sugarcane should be done to avoid lodging.
Drain excess water to prevent wilting in brinjal.
Repair and strengthen trellis in vines and cucurbits.
Treat damaged seedlings with appropriate formulations.
Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap whitefly vectors.
Alternate spraying of Neem oil formulation and flonicamid to control whitefly.
Test water quality in fish ponds and apply lime as needed.
Ensure animals are vaccinated against common diseases.
Keep animal sheds clean and dry to protect animals from diseases.
